name: RUNNING !!!!
description:
the main character follows your mouse and you can use your mouse buttons, you lose if you're not on a photo :)

//eyestrain warning + not really flashing light but some kinda jittering images,  its  a generally pretty overwhelming game i wouldn't blame u for skipping it

credits:

(i've been rly looking into like assets and tools lately, trying to actually make my life easier + use this jam as a way of learning them so this list is pretty long)

photos are from this pack which u can get here on itch.io: https://spacetwinks.itch.io/a-place-without-bodies

sound dash/death sound effects are from this: https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx

it uses this for collisions: https://github.com/Lojemiru/Loj-Hadron-Collider

and this for alarms: https://github.com/Lojemiru/Stopwatch

+ the weird posterization stuff is gamemakers new effects layers thing, food for me
